question:
You are due to move into a rented apartment next month but you will not be able to because you have some problems.


Write a letter to the course provider. In your letter,


explain your situation
describe your problems
tell him/her when you think you can move in
text: As you are aware, I planned to move into the apartment at 13, Grant Road on 1st October 2020. Sadly, I am afraid  I won't be able to proceed with our plan, owing to my current medical condition.

Last week at work, we had a team outing encompassing varied sporting events. During the basketball game, there was some water spilled at one edge of the court which caused me to slip and fell. I was rushed to the hospital and after examining my hand's X-ray, the doctor concluded that its a fracture which would take nearly 6-8 weeks to heal, thus violating our original agreed upon date.

Currently, I am sitting at my home in Kuala Lumpur with a plastered hand. I hope you understand my dile.ma and I would love to move into the same house, but a month later, which would be 1st November 2020. Looking forward to a positive response from you.
